Who am I?

About me

I am a 26-year-old Software Developer who is fascinated with science and tech. I come from the volcanic island of La Palma, Canary Islands, though fate put me in Germany 7 years ago. After having learned German, I set out to try different things in search of an activity that would challenge my creativity and make me feel alive. Programming and astronomy did the trick, and that's the reason you are reading this and why I have a YouTube channel.

I'm a perpetual learner and love reading books that teach me new things. I enjoy traveling the world whenever I can, fitness and my plant-based meals.

Face Recognition SmartBrain (in progress)

My biggest and most complicated project up to date, built on React. It involves both Frontend and Backend using the Clarifai API. I am currently finishing the project as I learn more about Backend and will update it here once it's finished.
